title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a field with three types of content (HTML text within <html> tags, HTML fragments not within <html> tags, and text with RTF tags), the content type of the dynamic text element does not have any effect.
OB: The dynamic text element is displaying all types of content in the same format, regardless of the content type specified.
EB: The dynamic text element should respect the content type specified and display the content accordingly. HTML text within <html> tags should be rendered as proper HTML content, HTML fragments not within <html> tags should be displayed as plain text or escaped HTML, and text with RTF tags should be rendered with proper formatting.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:1. Create a field with three types of content: 
    - HTML text within <html> tags
    - HTML fragments not within <html> tags
    - Text with RTF tags
2. Configure a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.
3. Verify that the dynamic text element is displaying all types of content in the same format, regardless of the content type specified.
